00013     PrimaryGeneratorMessenger::PrimaryGeneratorMessenger(PrimaryGeneratorAction* thePrimaryGeneratorAction) :
00014             primaryGeneratorAction_(thePrimaryGeneratorAction) {
00015 
00016         // lhe commands
00017         lheDir_ = new G4UIdirectory("/ldmx/generators/lhe/");
00018         lheDir_->SetGuidance("Commands for LHE event generation");
00019 
00020         lheOpenCmd_ = new G4UIcommand("/ldmx/generators/lhe/open", this);
00021         G4UIparameter* lhefilename = new G4UIparameter("filename", 's', true);
00022         lheOpenCmd_->SetParameter(lhefilename);
00023         lheOpenCmd_->AvailableForStates(G4ApplicationState::G4State_PreInit, G4ApplicationState::G4State_Idle);
00024 
00025         // root commands
00026         rootDir_ = new G4UIdirectory("/ldmx/generators/root/");
00027         rootDir_->SetGuidance("Commands for ROOT event generation");
00028 
00029         rootOpenCmd_ = new G4UIcommand("/ldmx/generators/root/open", this);
00030         G4UIparameter* rootfilename = new G4UIparameter("filename", 's', true);
00031         rootOpenCmd_->SetParameter(rootfilename);
00032         rootOpenCmd_->AvailableForStates(G4ApplicationState::G4State_PreInit, G4ApplicationState::G4State_Idle);
00033 
00034         rootUseSeedCmd_->AvailableForStates(G4ApplicationState::G4State_PreInit, G4ApplicationState::G4State_Idle);
00035     }

00039     void PrimaryGeneratorMessenger::SetNewValue(G4UIcommand* command, G4String newValues) {
00040 
00042         if (command == lheOpenCmd_) { 
00043             primaryGeneratorAction_->setPrimaryGenerator(new LHEPrimaryGenerator(new LHEReader(newValues))); 
00044         }
00045     
00047         else if (command == rootOpenCmd_) { 
00048             primaryGeneratorAction_->setPrimaryGenerator(new RootPrimaryGenerator(newValues)); 
00049         } else if (command == rootUseSeedCmd_) {
00050             useRootSeed_ = true; 
00051         }
00052 
00054         else if (command == enableMPGunCmd_) { 
00055             primaryGeneratorAction_->setPrimaryGenerator(new MultiParticleGunPrimaryGenerator());
00056         } else if (command == mpgunNParCmd_) { 
00057             int curi = primaryGeneratorAction_->getIndexMPG();
00058             if (curi >= 0) ( dynamic_cast<MultiParticleGunPrimaryGenerator*>(primaryGeneratorAction_->getGenerator(curi)) )->setMpgNparticles( G4UIcommand::ConvertToDouble(newValues) ); 
00059         } else if (command == enableMPGunPoissonCmd_) { 
00060             int curi = primaryGeneratorAction_->getIndexMPG();
00061             if (curi >= 0) ( dynamic_cast<MultiParticleGunPrimaryGenerator*>(primaryGeneratorAction_->getGenerator(curi)) )->enablePoisson(); 
00062         } else if (command == mpgunPIDCmd_) { 
00063             int curi = primaryGeneratorAction_->getIndexMPG();
00064             if (curi >= 0) ( dynamic_cast<MultiParticleGunPrimaryGenerator*>(primaryGeneratorAction_->getGenerator(curi)) )->setMpgPdgId( G4UIcommand::ConvertToInt(newValues) ); 
00065         } else if (command == mpgunVtxCmd_) { 
00066             int curi = primaryGeneratorAction_->getIndexMPG();
00067             if (curi >= 0) ( dynamic_cast<MultiParticleGunPrimaryGenerator*>(primaryGeneratorAction_->getGenerator(curi)) )->setMpgVertex( G4UIcommand::ConvertToDimensioned3Vector(newValues) ); 
00068         } else if (command == mpgunMomCmd_) { 
00069             int curi = primaryGeneratorAction_->getIndexMPG();
00070             if (curi >= 0) ( dynamic_cast<MultiParticleGunPrimaryGenerator*>(primaryGeneratorAction_->getGenerator(curi)) )->setMpgMomentum( G4UIcommand::ConvertToDimensioned3Vector(newValues) ); 
00071         }        
00072 
00074         else if (command == enableBeamspotCmd_) { 
00075             primaryGeneratorAction_->setUseBeamspot(true); 
00076         } else if (command == beamspotXSizeCmd_) {
00077             primaryGeneratorAction_->setBeamspotXSize( G4UIcommand::ConvertToDouble(newValues) ); 
00078         } else if (command == beamspotYSizeCmd_) { 
00079             primaryGeneratorAction_->setBeamspotYSize( G4UIcommand::ConvertToDouble(newValues) ); 
00080         }
00081     }
